Package dao

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CompanyDAO
    This interface class is designed to bound the implements class to apply the following method.

    This interface class is designed to bound the implements class to apply the following method.

    this interface class is designed to bound the implements class to apply the following method.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CompanyDBDAO
    The class Company is the class that do all the required access work with DB using the methods below.
    ConnectionPool
    This is the class which provide connection to the DB and also close all the connection.
    CouponDBDAO  
    CustomerDBDAO
    The class CustomerDBDAO is the class that do all the required access work with DB using the methods below.
    DailyCouponExpirationTask
    This is a Thread implements Runnable It's a thread that once a day going through all the last dates of all the coupons in the DB and delete the expired one from the DB.
